Admissions Guide

Clear, supportive, and parent-friendly enrollment process with full documentation and guidance.

Step-by-Step Admission Process

From first inquiry to class entry, we keep every step transparent.

1

Inquire

Contact admissions by phone, email, or inquiry form.

2

Tour

Visit classrooms and meet school leadership.

3

Submit Documents

Provide learner records and parent details.

4

Placement Review

Age-appropriate assessment and support planning.

5

Confirm Enrolment

Receive admission letter and onboarding schedule.

Age Criteria and Requirements

Class LevelRecommended Age
PP14 years by January
PP25 years by January
Grade 16 years by January
Grade 712-13 years
  • Completed admission form
  • Birth certificate copy
  • Parent/guardian ID copy
  • Two passport photos
  • Latest school report for transfers

Important Dates and Downloads

  • 15
    Mar

    Term 2 Intake Opens

    Interview slots and document checks begin.

  • 22
    May

    Term 2 Intake Deadline

    Final submission date for confirmed intake.

  • 14
    Aug

    2027 Early Enrollment

    Priority window opens for January intake.

Frequently Asked Questions

Our average ratio is approximately 1:20, allowing targeted support and regular progress feedback.

Yes. Structured supervision is available for approved pickup windows in line with school policy.

Subject to space availability and placement review, transfer students can be admitted during active terms.
